name: Easy car rental lightslider
author: Filipescu Alexandru

sections.description:
This plugin is only for the theme Easy Car Rental, it is very easy to use, it only has to be activated and it will be displayed under the name of “Light slider” with some pictures.
It can only be used to change the pictures of the slider in the main page.
sections.installation: This plugin is automatically required by the theme Easy Car Rental so there is no need in downloading it individually, also it can’t be used on other themes so there is no need at all to download it directly.
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin with other theme than Easy Car Rental?

Absolutely not, for the moment I only developed this plugin for my Theme that will be online very soon.
